text:
A disclaimer: Always read
your TV manufacturer's

warranty information and
suggestions for cleaning your TV
before attempting to clean your screen.
First, make sure your TV is turned off.

Don't spray anything
directly onto your TV.

Instead, add a small amount
of moisture to your cloth.

Slowly and gently wipe the TV
screen in circular motions.

If you need to, support
the TV with your other hand
so that it doesn't fall over.

If there is a particularly
dirty or caked-on area,

you can add a tiny drop of
mild dish soap to the cloth.

Dry the screen with a
dry microfiber cloth.
Finally, use a dry microfiber cloth
to wipe the sides and back of the TV.
